有人申請過google map非營利的方案嗎? g0v空汙觀測網的流量超過免費流量額度了，轉移到openstreetmap又是個大工程Orz
我們公司最近有架 openstreetmap server ，我們公司來討論一下讓社群可以免費用現成的 OSM WMS 的事好了
聽asper說如果要轉移到openstreetmap幾乎是砍掉重練，短時間有點困難，所以在找google的免費方案
看到google有非營利組織的免費方案，想說問問看這邊有沒有人有經驗，他好像有要求法人登記
I can provide web-maptiles which covered Taiwan area also. it  based OpenStreetMap unde CCBY, Odbl license. it is free for civictech projects.
if you have any interesting, please touch me
https://mierune.co.jp/tile.html#en
slackbot9's url: [MIERUNE Inc.]

You could use an API proxy to roundrobin between two google credentials/accounts? You could move complicated google auth to the API proxy itself and just use simple tokens for talking to the proxy from the app (or something else like that).

I heard about a great proxy from a presentation by an <http://apigee.com|apigee.com> employee. They seem to not publicize this, but he claimed its what does the heavy lifting in parts of their product offering: https://github.com/argo/titan
